doc.p: The university policy on the dissemination of research and scholarly output requires all research and scholarly output to be deposited in the institutional repository.

You should normally upload the author accepted manuscript version of your file. This is the final draft author manuscript, as accepted for publication by a journal, including modifications based on referees' suggestions, before it has undergone copyediting and proof correction.
doc.h2: When should I deposit my file?
doc.p: The author accepted manuscript must be deposited in the repository immediately upon acceptance by the publisher.
